snippet: An interview with Justin Wolfers, co-author of a recent study concluding that who voters think will win is a more reliable predictor of the outcome than asking them how they plan to vote.
abstract: An interview with Justin Wolfers, co-author of a recent study concluding that who voters think will win is a more reliable predictor of the outcome than asking them how they plan to vote.

headline.main: Q. and A. on Forecasting Based on Voter Expectations
